title: Overwatch 2 and Diablo IV Get Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.03.21
description:
Blessing and Andy tackle a HUGE day of news with Overwatch 2 and Diablo IV getting delayed, Jen Oneal stepping down from Blizzard, Elden Ring gameplay incoming, Donkey Kong moving coming, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:09 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is happening THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear, a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and me drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.
A new episode of Gamescast is up right now. Imran returns for an episode to talk with us for our reviews of Riders Republic and Mario Party Superstars and a preview of Shin Megami Tensei V. That’s up on Youtube.com/Kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:26 - Diablo IV and Overwatch 2 have been Delayed and Jen Oneal Steps Down From Blizzard - Imran Khan @ Fanbyte
00:21:10 - A new look into Elden Ring gameplay is coming
00:31:30 -  Ad
00:34:45 - Donkey Kong Movie Starring Seth Rogen Reportedly in Development - Ryan Leston @ IGN
00:40:55 - Netflix Games starts global rollout on Android, with iOS ‘on the way’ - Ash Parrish @ The Verge
00:48:11 - Niantic Shutting Down Pokémon Go-Inspired Harry Potter Game - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:56:00 - Dreams Joins Forces with Ghostbusters: Afterlife for Official Mini-Game Based on the Movie - Stephen Tailby @ PushSquare
01:02:40 - Out today
01:03:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tam and Tim

Blessing and Andy tackle a HUGE day of news with Overwatch 2 and Diablo IV getting delayed, Jen Oneal stepping down from Blizzard, Elden Ring gameplay incoming, Donkey Kong moving coming, and more!


Time Stamps -

Extra Life is happening THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear, a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and me drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.

A new episode of Gamescast is up right now. Imran returns for an episode to talk with us for our reviews of Riders Republic and Mario Party Superstars and a preview of Shin Megami Tensei V. That’s up on Youtube.com/Kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
